Entries.1{{YearRemainder}}: Mom and Dad sent us another letter the other day. I wonder how they've been?$s

Entries.27{{YearRemainder}}: Oh, @, I had a great time singing with my parrot friend the other day! I think he's healing well.$h

Entries.Mon8: @, I think there's something very special about you.
Entries.2{{YearRemainder}}: Made some overnight oats the other day, with fresh strawberries!$h
Entries.4{{YearRemainder}}: Ugh, I think our sink is leaking. Gotta go find a plumber, I guess.$s
Entries.6{{YearRemainder}}: @! Look at this new yarn my mother sent me! Isn't it so soft?$h
Entries.11{{YearRemainder}}: I love taking walks, whenever I have the time to do so.$h#$b#One of the best parts of living here.$h
Entries.13{{YearRemainder}}: I'm hoping at some point to move away and see if I can make it as a fashion designer.
Entries.17{{YearRemainder}}: Have I considered moving out of town? Of course I have, but Pelican Town is my home.
Entries.18{{YearRemainder}}: Started working on a new dress! I'm thinking cute little cap sleeves and a full circle skirt...$h
Entries.19{{YearRemainder}}: Sometimes when the Saloon isn't busy Gus lets me rest my feet and knit for a while.#$b#Did you know that Joja cashiers aren't allowed to sit down? I can't imagine how much their feet must hurt.
Entries.25{{YearRemainder}}: The month is almost over. Say, @, what are you planning for next month?

Entries.8{{YearRemainder}}: @, I sense good things happening to you today.
Entries.10{{YearRemainder}}: @, I think luck will be on your side today!
Entries.winter_Sun4: I sense a good aura around you today, @.$h#$b#Something about you is especially....wonderful...today.$h

Entries.2_2: I believe that if you're kind to nature, nature will be kind to you in turn.
Entries.3_2: Haley has always been the baby of the family.#$b#She's only a few years younger than I am, but our parents definitely spoiled her more.#$e#Sometimes I worry.
Entries.5_2: I like doing flatfelled seams, even if they're a lot of work. They're so much more durable!$h
Entries.7_2: We used to love visiting castles with our parents.$s
Entries.8_2: I've considered moving away from Pelican Town, yes.#$e#No, don't get me wrong, I love it here, but our local employment options can be...lacking.$s#$e#If I want a future that's not just being a barmaid I may need to leave.#$b#I really don't want to, though.
Entries.9_2: Pelican Town is so beautiful. I wish I could spend more time exploring the forest.$s#$b#I've got work all the time though.
Entries.11_2: Gus wakes up at the crack of dawn to make bread for the Saloon. Honestly, I'm not quite sure when he sleeps...#$b#Probably the hardest working man in all of this town. And the best boss I could ask for.$h
Entries.12_2: My father was originally from Pelican Town, but he moved away for college.#$e#We moved back when I was around five or so? Mom and Dad wanted a safer, quieter place to raise kids.
Entries.13_2: Dad was a traveling salesman. Always gone on a trip to some location or another.#$e#Mom had to travel a lot for her law practice too.
Entries.Tue10: I've made most of my clothing, I love to sew.$h#$b#Plus, you get better clothing if you make it yourself.
Entries.Sun6: Our parents? I'm not quite sure where they're traveling these days...$s
Entries.summer_Sun: @, what have you been up to?$h
Entries.summer_Sat6: @, you've ever just taken a day for yourself? The lovely weather these days makes me really want to!

Entries.7_2: I've been doing a lot of lace insertion work lately. It's so pretty but so tedious.
Entries.8_2: @, do you think I could sell the clothing I make?
Entries.9_2: Made a lovely pizza with a cauliflower base the other day. Haley hated it though.
Entries.11_2: Gus gave me some spaghetti to take home the other day.$h#$b#To be honest, @, if Gus didn't give Haley and me food I'm not sure what we'd be eating most nights.$s
Entries.13_2: Started knitting a new set of socks the other day. Socks are so fast and easy to knit, and most people like them as presents.#$b#Except Haley.
Entries.14_2: Gus gave us some day-old bread the other day and we made sandwiches with pickled daikon and falafel. Haley loved it too!$h
Entries.15_2: I made some {{i18n: dishes.adult.{{Random: 03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08, 09, 01, 02}} }} the other day. It was delicious!$h
Entries.16_2: Ugh, I wish Haley would do her share of the chores without me having to remind her all the time.$s
